personal.name: Ardiansyah
personal.title: AI Engineer & Computer Engineering Student
personal.bio: I'm a passionate AI Engineer and Computer Engineering student at Universitas Negeri Makassar, currently in my 6th semester. My journey in technology began with curiosity about how machines can learn and make intelligent decisions. I specialize in developing practical AI solutions including computer vision systems, optical mark recognition (OMR), and intelligent recommendation algorithms that solve real-world problems in education and business.
personal.philosophy: I believe that artificial intelligence should augment human capabilities and solve practical problems that matter. My approach focuses on creating efficient, accurate, and ethically responsible AI systems that can make a positive impact on education, business automation, and society through innovative applications of machine learning and computer vision technologies.

achievements.title: High Academic Performance
achievements.description: Maintaining excellent GPA while actively developing AI projects

achievements.title: OMR Grading System Project
achievements.description: Developed computer vision system with 95%+ accuracy for automated grading

achievements.title: Multiple AI Projects
achievements.description: Successfully completed 5+ major AI and web development projects

career_objectives: Develop intelligent AI systems for educational automation and assessment
Advance computer vision applications in real-world business scenarios
Build scalable and accurate machine learning solutions with high performance
Contribute to innovative AI research and open-source development
Bridge the gap between academic AI research and practical industry applications
Specialize in optical mark recognition and automated grading systems
